titleStmt.title: SII 5.281: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 281. (A.R. No. 605 of 1893). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . kopparakecaripanmaraāna tripuvanaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīviranārāyaṇatevaṟku yāṇṭu patinoṉṟāvatu kiraṉūrāna koḻumaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūr Āḷḷuṭaiyā
r tiruvākicuramuṭaiyāṟku coḻaṉ cuntanāṉa viracoḻa Aṇuttirappallavaraiyaṉeṉ Amutupaṭikku viṭṭa nilam Ūṟku meṟku Āṟṟukkup ponaviṭattu
vaṭakkum melkiḻaikkup pona viṭṭalukkuk kiḻakku nilam Orumāvum veṭṭukkaḷattukku vaṭakku Aḻakiyacoḻappallavaraiyar nilattukku vaṭakku kaṭaikkuṟicci nāyanār nilattukku kiḻa
kku kuppāṇṭān nilattukkut teṟku virāṇappallaraiyaṉ nilattukku meṟku nila munṟumāvum kaḷikkūṟṟil nilam melaiyorumāvukku vayittiya nilattukku meṟku tennaveḷar nilattu
kkut teṟku Aḻakiyapāṇṭinilattukku kiḻakku koṅkaveḷar nilattukku vaṭakku nilam Oru māvum kaḷikkūṟṟil kiḻai Orumā paṇṭāri ceykku kiḻakku kucavan ceykku vaṭakku vayanāṭṭaraiyaṉ
ceykku meṟku menāṭṭaraiyan ceykku teṟku nilam Oru māvum Āka nilam Āṟu māvum Ikkoyilukku nimantappuṟamāka viṭṭa nilan taṇakkamulaiyil Uvaccaṟku nilam Irukalanel vitai
yum nimantakkāṟaṟku nilam Orumāvum ciṟukkuḷattu nilam koṅkūṟkup pāykiṟa peruvāykkālukku vaṭakku Uvaccappuṟam Orumāvum nimantappuṟam Orumāvum Itaṟku Ellai Aṅkarāyar ce
ykkuk kiḻakku Uṭaiyār ceykkut teṟku vāṇarāyar ceyk
ku meṟku Āka nilam nālmāvaraiyum cantirātittiyavarai coḻa
n cuntanāṉa viracoḻa Aṇuttirappallavaraiyannen Innā
yaṉāṟku Amutupaṭikku nimantappuṟamum Iṭṭu kalveṭṭik kuṭutten
Itu panmāhe
śvara rakṣai
Digital edition of SII 5.281 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Renato Dávalos.
